page.title: 10SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: IN CENTRAL AND WESTERN GREENOCK THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF SPORTS FACILITIES SUCH AS PLAYING FIELDS, SWIMMING POOL, TENNIS CLUBS, BOWLING CLUBS, CRICKET AND RUGBY CLUBS AND A SPORTS CENTRE. THERE IS ALSO AN ATHLETIC CLUB CALLED GLENPARK HARRIERS. TO JOIN ANY OF THESE CLUBS YOU USUALLY HAVE TO PAY A MEMBERSHIP FEE EACH YEAR, BUT FOR THE SWIMMING POOL AND SPORTS CENTRE YOU ONLY PAY FOR A SESSION. MOST OF THESE FACILITIES ARE FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES, AND SOMETIMES YOU CAN GET A FAMILY MEMBERSHIP IN WHICH THE WHOLE FAMILY ARE MEMBERS. THERE ARE ALSO PLANS TO BUILD AN ICE RINK AS PART OF A REDEVELOPMENT PLAN FOR AN AREA OF DERELICT DOCKLAND NEAR GREENOCK TOWN CENTRE, THOUGH THIS MAY NOT GO AHEAD DUE TO SHORTAGE OF MONEY.
